alert.note: Alert for Creek (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 7:55AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Creek and central Tulsa Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 755 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Kellyville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Sand Springs... Sapulpa... Jenks... Kellyville... Jenks Riverside Airport... Gray... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 196 and 224. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
